details: {'dialog_loc': '50%,80%', 'dialog_text': "Hey, before ye start a new adventure, there's an event active! Events are temporary campaigns that last for a limited time and provide great rewards, like brand new Champions. Click here to view the event campaign.", 'arrow_dir': 'up', 'dialog_hero_id': 1}
name: start_event_adventure_1

details: {'dialog_loc': '50%,80%', 'dialog_text': "During each event, a different deity watches over our party, so there's a new type of Divine Favor to collect. Don't be alarmed if ye start with no bonuses, they'll ramp up quickly during events!", 'blocker_mode': 'all', 'show_close_button': 5, 'dialog_hero_id': 1}
name: start_event_adventure_2

details: {'dialog_loc': '50%,50%', 'dialog_text': "Event adventures cost Event Tokens to start. Ye collect tokens just by killin' monsters in any campaign or adventure. The tokens for this event are called $token_plural, and ye've already got $token_count of them. If ye don't have enough to start an adventure now, don't fret. Just do a different adventure until ye've collected enough, then reset again.", 'blocker_mode': 'all', 'show_close_button': 5, 'dialog_hero_id': 1}
name: start_event_adventure_3

details: {'dialog_loc': '50%,50%', 'dialog_text': "Now that ye've recruited a new Champion, ye can gear them up by completing the variants or free play. The chests ye get from those adventures will award gear just for the new Champion! Ye can also buy more chests for them in the store while the event is runnin'.", 'blocker_mode': 'all', 'show_close_button': 5, 'dialog_hero_id': 1}
name: start_event_adventure_4

details: {'dialog_loc': '50%,80%', 'dialog_text': "Hey, before ye start a new adventure, there's an event active! Events are temporary campaigns that last for a limited time and provide great rewards, like brand new Champions. You're already on the event campaign map.", 'arrow_dir': 'up', 'dialog_hero_id': 1}
name: start_event_adventure_1_alt

details: {'dialog_loc': '50%,290', 'dialog_text': "Now that ye've been on a few Adventures, your Champions are ready to expand their horizons a bit! Ye can now start adventurin' in the Tomb of Annihilation Campaign! This Campaign unlocks new Adventures in an all new map, with all new locations and a new formation!", 'arrow_dir': 'up', 'dialog_hero_id': 1}
name: new_campaign_available

details: {'dialog_loc': '50%,290', 'dialog_text': "It looks like ye've decided to visit a new Campaign! Yer party will be blessed by a different Deity in every Campaign, so you'll have to start earnin' Favor with them from scratch. Make sure you check what blessing this Deity provides to your party, so that ye can be sure you've set your Formation up to take advantage!", 'arrow_dir': 'up', 'dialog_hero_id': 1}
name: open_new_campaign

details: {'dialog_text': "Familiars can now be summoned to help yer sore clickin' finger. Buy them here, then assign them to help ye click monsters, level up yer Champions, or trigger yer ultimate attacks.", 'tutorial_actions': ['show_familiar_button'], 'arrow_dir': 'left', 'dialog_hero_id': 1, 'dialog_loc': '50%,bottom_ui:-100', 'when_done': 'familiars_post', 'start_conditions': ['no_game_dialogs', {'or': ['stat_value,HighestAreaCompletedEver,>,66', 'entered_area,66']}], 'done_conditions': 'open_familiars', 'arrow_target': 'familiar_button', 'pause': False}
name: familiars

details: {'dialog_text': "Many familiars can be purchased fer gems, but a few will cost ye real money.
